# Social Media Preview Assets

This directory contains preview images for social media sharing.

## Files

- `banner.svg` - Project banner for GitHub README
- `logo.svg` - Project logo

## Usage

These images are used for:
- GitHub repository About section
- README.md header
- Social media sharing (Open Graph)
- Documentation header

## Suggested Banner Size

For GitHub: 1280x640 pixels
For Twitter Card: 1200x630 pixels
For Open Graph: 1200x630 pixels
